p: To address these research questions, we included the speaker’s and the audience’s world view as independent variables. In addition, we had participants retell the story at two points in time. As there exists not the one accepted and valid method to assess story content and structure, we applied three approaches complementing each other: A sorting task of story related concepts ( Coxon, 1999), and two methods from computational text analysis: similarity analysis ( Kjell et al., 2019) and dictionary analysis ( Welbers et al., 2017); for details see the method section.
